snippet.title: Sheltered: Beneath The Surface #4 'Road To Launch'
snippet.description:
Dive beneath the surface of Sheltered and learn about the latest update, which includes the full release of the game from early access and the chance to up the challenge in-game by seeking out a second shelter.

Download Sheltered now on:

PC - http://bit.ly/PCSheltered
Xbox One - http://bit.ly/XB1Sheltered
PlayStation 4 - http://bit.ly/PS4Sheltered

Team17, founded in 1990, are a fully independent Video Game Developer and Games Label, responsible for the Worms™ series, Beyond Eyes, Sheltered and  many more. Ensure you never miss out on our latest videos by subscribing to us now: bit.ly/SubTeam17

Don't forget you can also
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17
Follow us on Twitter: http://bit.ly/FollowT17
